items.sentence: I couldn\'t make myself understood in French.

I often have to talk to people I don\'t like.
Tom doesn\'t believe that it really happened.
We got married in Boston on October 20, 2013.
We got out of bed early on Christmas morning.
We have many reasons to be proud of our team.
It hasn\'t worked out as well as we\'d hoped.
